permission_to_send.description: Identifies the type of permission that the Constant Contact account has been granted to send email to the contact.

email_address.description: The contact's email address and related properties.

first_name.description: The first name of the contact.

last_name.description: The last name of the contact.

job_title.description: The job title of the contact.

company_name.description: The name of the company where the contact works.

create_source.description: Describes who added the contact; valid values are Contact or Account.

birthday_month.description: The month value for the contact's birthday. Valid values are from 1 through 12.

birthday_day.description: The day value for the contact's birthday. Valid values are from 1 through 31.

anniversary.description: The anniversary date for the contact.

custom_fields.description: Array of up to 25 custom_field key value pairs.

phone_numbers.description: Array of up to 3 phone numbers subresources.

kind.description: Identifies the type of phone number; valid values are home, work, mobile, or other.

street_addresses.description: Array of up to 3 street address subresources.

kind.description: Describes the type of address; valid values are home, work, or other.

street.description: Number and street of the address.

city.description: The name of the city where the contact lives.

state.description: The name of the state or province where the contact lives.

postal_code.description: The zip or postal code of the contact.

country.description: The name of the country where the contact lives.

list_memberships.description: Array of list_ids to which the contact is being subscribed, up to a maximum of 50.

taggings.description: Array of tags assigned to the contact, up to a maximum of 50.

notes.description: An array of notes about the contact.
